events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information has not been updated for several days, and I am worried about the delay.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report regarding the late arrival and stagnant tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support agent Mike to investigate the shipping delay and provide assistance to the customer.
Hello! I'm Mike from delivery support. I understand your laptop shipment is delayed. Let me check the tracking details and get back to you shortly.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address used? This will help me track the package with the courier company.
Thanks for replying. My order number is 1234567890, and the package was supposed to be sent to 456 Elm Street, Springfield.
I contacted the courier service, and it appears there was an unexpected delay. Your package is expected to arrive within three days. I will monitor the shipment and update you if anything changes.
Thank you for the update and for following up on the issue. I appreciate your help and hope the package arrives soon.
The package was delivered today as expected. I am closing the case now, but please contact us if you face any further issues.
Just checking in to ensure your laptop arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with how we handled the delivery delay.
Since there have been no further complaints, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
